Description: Textile fragment of undyed, medium-fine quality linen cloth; one plain selvedge. Second vertical edge is torn - transverse edges cut. Little slubs or knots in some warp threads. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.29 ends per 10mm and weft c.12-13 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Cuts are modern. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
